subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Dumars, Horford and Hardaway might evoke an N.B.A. roster, but the names this time belong to young Michigan players who are emerging from their fathers’ big shadows.
snippet: Dumars, Horford and Hardaway might evoke an N.B.A. roster, but the names this time belong to young Michigan players who are emerging from their fathers’ big shadows.
